entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of ice pellets before morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Ice pellets. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
